amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, increases funding for the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record toincrease funding for the Privacy and Civil Liberties Board from $750,000 to $3 million.

action.text: Maloney amendment (A020) modified by unanimous consent. Modification seeks to decrease the amount of $3 million proposed in the original amendment to $1.5 million for the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board.
On agreeing to the Maloney amendment (A020) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
